public class OpentokException
extends java.lang.Exception

Exceptions thrown by the OpenTok Android SDK.

Method Detail

getErrorDescription

public static java.lang.String getErrorDescription(OpentokException.ErrorCode errorCode)
Returns the error description.

getErrorDomain

public OpentokException.Domain getErrorDomain()
Returns the error domain. Values for the error domain are defined by the OpentokException.Domain enum.

getErrorCode

public OpentokException.ErrorCode getErrorCode()
Returns the error code. Values for the error code are defined by the OpentokException.ErrorCode enum. Call the getErrorDescription(com.opentok.android.OpentokException.ErrorCode) method to get more details on the error.
